pageContext.claim: “In fact, we just sent a violation to the city of San Francisco: unsafe water, unsafe conditions, environmental -- EPA. Our EPA, which is doing a great job, is sending Nancy Pelosi, with all the talk about EPA -- there's needles and drugs all over the street.”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump administration is singling out California, apparently out of spite. About three dozen other states also have counties that failed to meet national benchmarks for air pollution and the EPA estimated that 3,508 community water systems were out of compliance with health standards. Yet Trump decided to target San Francisco, home of House Speaker Pelosi.
